index.title: CVOLT: Your Professional CV, Powered by AI
index.subtitle: Create stunning resumes, optimize them for ATS, and track your job applications with ease.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.createDescription: Start building your resume from scratch or with a template.
dashboard.browseTemplatesDescription: Discover our wide range of professional templates.
dashboard.myResumesDescription: Manage and edit your existing resumes.
dashboard.atsAnalyzerDescription: Optimize your resume to get past applicant tracking systems.

myResumes.description: Here you can manage all the resumes you have created.
myResumes.noResumes: You haven't created any resumes yet.

myResumes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this resume?
myResumes.deleteError: Failed to delete resume. Please try again.

resumeForm.summaryPlaceholder: Write a brief summary of your experience and career goals...
resumeForm.experiencePlaceholder: List your work experience, starting with the most recent. (Company, Job Title, Dates, Responsibilities & Achievements)...
resumeForm.educationPlaceholder: List your educational qualifications. (University, Major, Degree, Dates)...
resumeForm.skillsPlaceholder: List your key skills, separated by a comma. (e.g., Project Management, Digital Marketing, Data Analysis)...

validation.summaryMin: Summary must be at least 50 characters.
validation.experienceMin: Experience must be at least 50 characters.
validation.educationMin: Education must be at least 50 characters.

createResume.cardDescription: Start by filling in the basic details.

templates.title: Browse Templates
templates.description: Choose the template that best fits your style and industry.

proUpsell.title: Want More Professional Templates?
proUpsell.description: Upgrade to a Pro subscription to access over 20 exclusive templates and advanced features!

modernMinimalist.name: Modern Minimalist
modernMinimalist.description: A clean, modern design that focuses on content.

professionalClassic.name: Professional Classic
professionalClassic.description: A traditional, professional design suitable for all industries.

creativePortfolio.name: Creative Portfolio
creativePortfolio.description: Perfect for designers and artists to showcase their work.

techSavvy.name: Tech Savvy
techSavvy.description: A design that highlights technical skills and experience.

executiveSummary.name: Executive Summary
executiveSummary.description: A concise and impactful executive summary.

ats.title: ATS & CVOLT-Score Analysis
ats.description: Optimize your resume to get past Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and increase your interview chances.

uploadCard.title: Upload Your Resume
uploadCard.description: Paste your resume text below or upload a file to get started.

tipsCard.title: ATS Optimization Tips
tipsCard.description: Learn how to make your resume ATS-friendly.
tipsCard.tip1: Use relevant keywords from the job description.
tipsCard.tip2: Keep the formatting simple and clean.
tipsCard.tip3: Avoid complex graphics or tables that an ATS may not read.
tipsCard.tip5: Ensure your resume is free of spelling and grammatical errors.

pricing.title: Our Pricing Plans
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs, whether you're just starting out or looking for advanced solutions.

questions.title: Have Questions?
questions.description: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions about our plans.
